text: Ihamte prthiraita bicarana nakarae neki? Tetiyahe sihamte dekha palehemtena, purbe yisakala achila sihamtara parainama kenekuraa haichila. Sihamte ihamtara tulanata prthiraita saktita arau kirtita achila ati prabala. Tathapi'o allahe sihamtaka sihamtara aparaadhara babe karaayatta karaichila arau allahara sastira paraa sihamtaka raksa karaibalai kono nachila
